name: Love is Colorblind
description:
Survive in this spooky game with the help of your team!

You will need the help of all your friends if you hope to win. This game shows that relying on the ones you love is essential to get through scary times.

How to play:
Use the space bar to transition between you characters, or, if you prefer, just hit the numbers 1 to 3.
Use your mouse for shooting.
